title: Radiantly Alive
author: Anna Phipps
description: Radiantly Alive offers yoga classes, teacher training courses, intensives, and innovative workshops in their beautiful space in Ubud. The staff helps you lead a fuller, happier, healthier life. Radiantly Alive offers a wide selection of classes and styles of yoga including beginners yoga, radiantly alive vinyasa yoga, ashtanga Mysore, iyengar and Tibetan heart yoga, fly high, roll and release, arm balance foundations, acro yoga, restorative yoga, yin besides salsa dance and pilates.

[Read more](javascript://) This yoga studio is often compared to The Yoga Barn, it has a similar hip eco concept and variety of classes but Radiantly Alive has smaller class sizes so it feels more intimate but is more expensive than The Yoga Barn. Radiantly Alive also offers a range of holistic therapies including healing massage therapy and astrological counselling. Treatments at Radiantly Alive are tailored to the individual's specific needs to restore, heal and improve your radiance.
